org.ensembl.variation.datamodel
Interface TranscriptVariation

All Superinterfaces:
Persistent, java.io.Serializable
public interface TranscriptVariation
extends Persistent

A TranscriptVariation object represents a variation feature which is in close proximity to an Ensembl transcript. A TranscriptVariation object has several attributes which define the relationship of the variation to the transcript.

Author:
Craig Melsopp

getPeptideAlleleString

public java.lang.String getPeptideAlleleString()
The pep allele string is a '/' delimited string of amino acid codes representing the change to the peptide made by this variation. A '-' represents one half of a insertion/deletion. The reference allele (the one found in the ensembl peptide) should be first.

Returns:
peptide allele string.
